body:
Comment 1: 
ArrayOf is nearly entirely implemented in package reflect, where it is currently named
arrayOf. We won't finish it for Go 1.2 but maybe for Go 1.3.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, **go1.3maybe**, removed **priority-triage**, **go1.2maybe**._ _Owner changed to @rsc._ _Status changed to **Started**._
